se.miun.itm.input.sql.example.query

Class SQLFileDatabaseQuerier

  • java.lang.Object
    • se.miun.itm.input.sql.example.query.DatabaseQuerier
      • se.miun.itm.input.sql.example.query.SQLFileDatabaseQuerier

  • public class SQLFileDatabaseQuerier
extends DatabaseQuerier
    Used for reading queries from SQL files and sending them to SQL databases.
    Author:
    Stefan Karlsson

    • Method Detail

      • query

        public void query(java.sql.Connection conn,
         java.io.File queryDir)
           throws se.miun.itm.input.model.IOInPUTException,
                  se.miun.itm.input.model.SQLInPUTException
        Reads queries from the SQL files in the given directory and sends them to the designated database.
        Parameters:
        conn - A connection to the database that shall be queried.
        queryDir - The directory containing the SQL files with the queries.
        Throws:
        se.miun.itm.input.model.IOInPUTException - If an I/O error occurs.
        se.miun.itm.input.model.SQLInPUTException - If a database error occurs.

      • readSQLFiles

        public java.util.SortedMap<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> readSQLFiles(java.io.File dir)
                                                                    throws se.miun.itm.input.model.IOInPUTException
        Returns a SortedMap that maps the names of the SQL files in the given directory to the queries that they contain. The filenames are in alphabetical order.
        Parameters:
        queryDir - The directory containing the SQL files with the queries.
        Throws:
        se.miun.itm.input.model.IOInPUTException - If an I/O error occurs.
